nonAdoWorkflow.description: As a user, I want to complete a full Non-ADO workflow from launch to Git publishing, manually entering all project details for comprehensive test automation.
nonAdoWorkflow.acceptanceCriteria:
Launch the URL https://pxeaccelerators-insprintmvp.deloitte.com

Launch Page Setup:
- I start on the launch page and see the Welcome to AutoSprint.qe text on the page
- I enter my Azure DevOps PAT Token (Personal Access Token) with validation (required, max 255 characters)
- I select my Organization from the dropdown
- I configure AI and Vector DB settings:
  - Choose between Use default (built-in) or Provide my own configuration Radio options
  - If custom: Enter completion endpoint, API key, model, embedding endpoint/key/model, and PostgreSQL database details
- I click Submit button to proceed to the main application

Non-ADO Workflow Selection & Manual Entry:
- On the main page, I select the Non-ADO radio button
- I manually enter all work item details:
  - Project Name: Custom project name that updates application state
  - Description: User story description
  - Acceptance Criteria: Acceptance criteria
  - Custom Instructions/Gherkin Prompt: Editable text area for test generation guidance
  - File Uploads: Click on the file selection area Click to select files and browse for supported formats (jpg, png, jpeg, xlsx)

Repository & Branch Selection:
- User clicks on Fetch repositories and branches icon beside Git repository dropdown
- Select Git repository and branch from dropdowns

Test Case Generation & Automation Script Creation:
- I click Generate Gherkin Test Case button to create Gherkin test cases. After successful generation of test cases â€“ Count should be displayed on top of table as Generated Test Cases (2)
